venue.name: Microsoft New England Research and Development Center

item.description:
Boston WordPress Member Kurt Eng has volunteered to do a demonstration involving the Thesis premium WordPress theme, developed by Chris Pearson, available at http://diythemes.com/....

"For those interested in the theme Thesis, we will do a real-time demonstration of how to setup, customize and launch. The best part is that I [Kurt] have never used Thesis, so you will also get an understanding of its learning curve and difficulty. This presentation is tailored to the beginner/intermediate user of WordPress."
item.name: Boston WordPress August 2009 Meetup
